name: Smartblind
tagline: Smart Blind is an IOT application using raspberry pi. This is an android client application where you can view the current temperature and light intensity from the pi's temperature and light sensitive sensors.
body:
# SmartBlind Smart Blind is an IOT application using raspberry pi as a server.
The android client lets you view the current temperature and light intensity of the room from the pi's temperature and light sensitive sensors.
You can interact with the physical world by performing an action on the sensors.
![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4101783/10891081/eeed0128-8169-11e5-999a-e6e0ce89e3d8.png) # Features 1. Add fuzzy rules to define blind action e.g. to close the when it is bright and temperature is cold. 2. Get push notifications for every 2 degree change in temperature. 3. 3-D touch to view application temperature and light intensity on the app. # Contribute Email us at srp4698@rit.edu or sbp3624@rit.edu to know more about the server side configuration. At this point we are more focussed on user experience. Feel free to add features on the application keep an eye on issues to work on task right away.
